description:
Missile Defender Lite is a Missile Commander arcade clone. You are commanding a set of three SAM sites to protect up to six cities at a time from incoming ICBMs and enemy aircraft. The game has a fast paced action that will challenge your timing and prediction.  Simple to pickup from your last level and continue anytime or if you are for a real challenge try the Hardcore mode, this will keep you going from start to finish old school style!  

Challenge your spare time between meetings, in the elevator, at the can, during a train ride or while waiting for the significant other!  Beautiful graphics will provide eyecandy while challenging your predictive abilities.
